definitions: the action of applying a substance such as oil or grease to an engine or component so as to minimize friction and allow smooth movement

examples.text: instruments with moving parts may require lubrication

shortDefinitions: action of applying substance such as oil or grease

definitions: the action of making a process run smoothly

examples.text: banks provide the necessary financial lubrication for any economy to grow

shortDefinitions: action of making process run smoothly

definitions: the process of making people convivial through drinking alcohol

examples.text: a good time to talk with some beer for social lubrication
those emotional connections can only happen with the lubrication of alcohol

shortDefinitions: process of making people convivial with alcohol
